name: DiceMage
description:
Use your magic dice to kill your enemies! Shoot them randomly or control their luck!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Walking

Left Clicking - Shoot magical dice on mouse position(uses dice, collect them on the ground you can hold a maximum of five dice)

Space - Hold to Concentrate to change the result of dice rolls(Consumes luck, bar on right side of the screen) and release on the number you want(works on all dice on screen).

Dice:

One- Critical Failure! The dice flings in your direction and damages you.

Two- The dice flings towards enemies dealing a bit of damage and healing you.

Three- The dice pulls enemies towards it.

Four-The dice divides in two, rolling again with the same speed it had. 

Five-The dice gives back two dice and follows enemies dealing damage to one target.

Six-Critical Sucess! The dice explodes dealing damage in a massive area.
